system.description:
This weapon resembles the heavy crossbow but is smaller in size. It requires two hands to load, though only one hand is needed to fire.

This crossbow is a two-handed weapon; the wielder cannot use a shield and always loses individual initiative to characters using one-handed weapons. Halflings and small races, such as goblins, are unable to use this weapon.
